Docs.summary: Return the ID of this vibrator.
Docs.value: A non-negative integer representing the id of the vibrator controlled by this service, or -1 this service is not attached to any physical vibrator.

Docs.param: The number of milliseconds to vibrate.

corresponding to the vibration. For example, specify Android.Media.AudioAttributes.USAGE_ALARM for alarm vibrations or Android.Media.AudioAttributes.USAGE_NOTIFICATION_RINGTONE for vibrations associated with incoming calls.
Docs.summary: Vibrate constantly for the specified period of time.

Docs.param: an array of longs of times for which to turn the vibrator on or off.
the index into pattern at which to repeat, or -1 if you don't want to repeat.

the index into pattern at which to repeat, or -1 if you don't want to repeat.

corresponding to the vibration. For example, specify Android.Media.AudioAttributes.USAGE_ALARM for alarm vibrations or Android.Media.AudioAttributes.USAGE_NOTIFICATION_RINGTONE for vibrations associated with incoming calls.
